newsitem.title: USA: Kansas feedlot cattle market very slow - USDA.
newsitem.headline: Kansas feedlot cattle market very slow - USDA.

text.p: Trade very slow, with not enough slaughter steer or heifer sales confirmed for a market test, USDA said. Inquiry moderate, demand light.

Sales confirmed on 50 slaughter steers Monday and no slaughter heifers. For the week to date including late Friday and the weekend 1500 head confirmed. Sales FOB feedlot net weights after 4 percent shrink.
Slaughter steers - Load Select and Choice 2-3 1175 lb
Confirmed - 50 last week - none last year - none
Wk to date - 1,500 last week - 600 last year - 2,000
